content.abstract: This is a sample JSON document for testing the RKM CLI with JSON file ingestion.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: JSON documents can be ingested into the knowledge graph for structured data processing.

sections.heading: Methodology
sections.text: The system parses JSON files and extracts text content for embedding and graph construction.

sections.heading: Results
sections.text: Successfully processed JSON documents maintain their structure in the knowledge graph.
